ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Luclin madness (fix it dammit before coming up with new crap)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... A measley 500mb of RAM? Bah! My 1.4G athlon can handle 2G of RAM (which is what I have). It allows me to load 30 models. I only load a few though bc I m
ygData.messageBody:
> It did last time I was there, rumor is they've made
> improvements, but I still have yet to find any reason
> to bother. Nothing I really want from Luclin is that
> difficult to buy in EC...
>
> Perhaps the upcoming EQ expansion "Planes of Power"
> comes with a 2ghz athlon and 500mb of RAM so that
> everyone will have the "power" to actually run Luclin
> smoothly... *snicker*
>
A measley 500mb of RAM? Bah! My 1.4G athlon can handle 2G of RAM (which is
what I have). It allows me to load 30 models. I only load a few though bc
I'm too impatient for it to load all the armor models and equipment when
logging in. My computer is a powerhouse in those terms but my net connection
just sucks rocks. I will have to find out what to do about my phone company.
luv,
-Su
